name: Visual Dream Diary
description:
When I experience a really vivid and emotional dream, I often return to it in my mind. But what if I could revisit my dreams in a virtual space. And that's how this idea was born.

This game is a representation of three of my most vivid dreams. Each of them is associated with a certain thought I had while trying to fall asleep. 

Experience the dreams and interact with the elements of my subconsciousness in my game "Visual Dream Diary".
